data.system_settings: Asus Zenfone max pro m1 Android 8.1.0
data.actual_result: Audit logs show "ownership transferred to null" although if you filter results via "update server action" you can see the actual person
data.expected_result: Audit logs will show you who the ownership was transferred to
data.short_description: Server transfership in audit logs shows variable results.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be a server owner - Transfer ownership to another person and quickly leave server - Go to a "non owner account" and view audit logs.
